*0.2* (October 17th, 2006)

  • overrides default page caching method to record page cached and expired and use that information instead of going to the filesystem to see if cached file exists or not.
  • add unit testing
  • add method for action and fragment caching

*0.1* (October 5th, 2006)

  • first plugin release
